title: Huge, Modern Studio w/ Outdoor Pool & Fitness Room, Incl Heat & H.W.
posting_body: ['CAMBRIDGE – PORTER SQUARE', 'Price:', '$2,390', 'Available:', '08/05/22', 'STUDIO - 1 BATH', 'Huge, modern studio apartment near Porter Square.', 'Galley kitchen with dishwasher, disposal and maple cabinets.', 'Hardwood floors.', 'Wall air conditioner.', 'Amenities include: Outdoor pool, fitness center and community room.', 'Heat, hot water and cooking gas included in the rent.', 'Pets welcome (breed restrictions apply): $75/mo for dog and $50/mo for cat.', 'Coin-op laundry in the basement.', 'Driveway parking for $125/month.', 'NOTE:', 'Photos are of a model unit.', 'Listing# 195118244', '**NOTE: Price and availability, subject to change, without notice.', '**', 'Century 21 Avon', '1675 Massachusetts Ave.', 'Cambridge, MA 02138', '617-661-8400', 'E-mail: Click "Reply" button above.']
